name: JudgeFiteConcierge
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: judge fite concierge
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Judge Fite Concierge Alexa skill is an automated concierge for life offered by your real estate brokerage to help you complete all your moving and home management tasks. 

With this skill, you can find and connect with top-rated home pros recommended by your real estate agent, find top-rated moving companies, get information about your utilities and driver's license, as well as connect with your dedicated concierge. 

How it works:

Click on the Enable Skill and enter the email address you used to set up your Judge Fite Concierge account to find your agent. If you have not set up your account, search for an invite from your real estate agent or ask your agent to resend the invite. Once you link your Alexa account to your Judge Fite Concierge account, simply launch your automated concierge by using the phrase ”Alexa, launch judge fite concierge”. Then ask Alexa about any move or home service-related questions. Alexa will provide you the right details, connect you with top-rated home pros vetted and recommended by your agent, or have your amazing concierge reach out to you in case of any requests that Alexa cannot immediately assist you with. This skill will also give information about your utility providers and driver's license. This skill is supported on all Alexa echo series devices.
